title: Biden Nominee to Oversee Big Banks Faces Key Senate Hurdle
sub_head: Saule Omarova, the pick for comptroller of the currency, to testify before lawmakers
body:
WASHINGTON—Saule Omarova, President Biden’s choice to lead a top banking regulator, faces a critical test Thursday when she is scheduled to appear before a Senate banking panel and could face intense questioning about her thinking and past writing on bank oversight.
The Senate Banking Committee hearing for Ms. Omarova, a law professor at Cornell University, will be closely watched for clues about whether she can win over support from moderate Democrats, who will be crucial to advancing her nomination through the evenly divided chamber.
